long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of managing dozens of messages every day on LinkedIn?

Do you want to take conversation management to another level of efficiency? 

Piwaa is coming! 

This solution is an overlay to LinkedIn messaging, disastrous in terms of user experience and functionality, especially for prospecting.

â“ How does it works?

    1. Install Piwaa Chrome extension
    2. Log in to LinkedIn and click on Piwaa extension
    3. Handle all your message directly via Piwaa and enjoy its advanced features

ğŸ”¥ What does it allow?

Integrated into an optimized and pleasant user interface, this messaging allows to:

âœ… Schedule automatic follow-ups (when a contact ask to be recontacted later, for example)

âœ… Create and use saved replies for recurring questions

âœ… Take notes on prospects and assign them tags to optimize sorting and managing conversations

ğŸ”œ Zapier integration that allows to export prospects' information to any application including all CRMâ€™s

ğŸ”œ Connect multiple accounts to the same interface. Get all features for each account

ğŸ”œ Profile enrichment

ğŸ”œ Triggers based on event, for example when a prospect is tagged, a conversation archived and so on, prospect information is automatically synchronized with your CRM

ğŸ”œ Track the click on the links sent

ğŸ“‹ How do we manage your data?

We do not store any data as we retrieve the messages in real time from LinkedIn messaging. 

Piwaa behaves exactly like the standard LinkedIn messaging, the difference is in the interface and additional functionality that does not generate suspicious behavior with LinkedIn.
